I fucking hate this game tbh

Do you like working together as a team with other people to achieve a goal? Do you like it when the odds are stacked against you? Play survivor. 
 
Do you like being in control of a match and having more power than other players? Do you not have any friends IRL? Play killer. 
 
Pretty fun.
De los mejores juegos de terror, te llena de adrenalina y te llena de coraje
Either my internet is just that bad or this game lags way too much... Besides that its so much fun, especially with friends!

The game can get a bit repetitive after some time, but, I keep coming back to it after some days without playing. Guess that's a good thing, right?

I will say, however, that playing as a survivor gets olg really fast if you're alone. This is a game best played with friends.

Playing as the killer is only possible by yourself, but it can be very fun anyway (if you don't mind waiting for a considerable amount of time for a match to be found).
es muy divertido un buen juego para pasar el rato con amigos XD
